00014 def generate(env):
00015         """ Detect the cg library (nvidia) """
00016 
00017         from SCons.Options import Options
00018         cachefile = env['CACHEDIR']+'/libkdegames.cache.py'
00019         opts = Options(cachefile)
00020         opts.AddOptions(
00021                 ( 'HASCG', 'has the cg library' )
00022         )
00023         opts.Update(env)
00024 
00025         if 'configure' in env['TARGS'] or not env.has_key('HASCG'):
00026                 print "Checking for cg nvidia            : ",
00027                 
00028                 #import SCons.SConf
00029                 #conf = SCons.SConf.SConf( env )
00030                 #if not conf.CheckCHeader( 'Cg/cg.h' ):
00031                 import os
00032                 if not os.path.isfile( '/usr/include/Cg/cg.h' ):
00033                         print RED+'We really need the cg library !'+NORMAL
00034                         print RED+'Get ftp://download.nvidia.com/developer/cg/Cg_1.3/Linux/Cg-1.3.0501-0700.i386.tar.gz and unpack it in your root directory'+NORMAL
00035                         import sys
00036                         sys.exit(1)
00037                 else:
00038                         print GREEN+'looks good'+NORMAL
00039                 env['HASCG']=1
00040                 #env = conf.Finish()
00041                 opts.Save(cachefile, env)
